request.description:
Login to user account

Post variables:
user_name: <user name>
user_password: < user password>

Creating new user
================================================

Creating new user required "AccountType" as admin

Key:
first_name: <required> <name of the user>
last_name: <required> <last name of the user>
user_id: <required> <user id to login>
user_email: <required> <user email>
user_password: <required> <user password>
maximum_domains: <required> <maximum domain allowed for the user>
maximum_engines: <required> <maximum engines allowed for the user>
maximum_domains_in_engine: <required> <maximum domains for one engines>
account_type: <required> <'admin' or 'user'>
max_lic_days: <required> <maximum days allowed for the user>
user_ip: <required> <user ip addredd where account is created>

Get user Basic informations
=====================================

Request: none


Response fields:
1)result 2)data (or) message

1)result: "success" or "failed"

2)data:

FirstName
LastName
Email
LicenceEnd
LicenceStart
AccountCreatedDate
AccountStatus
MaximumDomains
MaximumEngines
MaximumDomainsInEngine
Engines

3)message: <  fail reasion>

Update user information
================================
update user email and password

user_email: <required>
user_password: <required>

Creating new Engine
=============================

request:

engine_name: <required>

engine_type: <required> <crawler or api>

response:

"results":"failed" or "result":"success"

Creating new domain for an specific engine
=============================================

request:
domain_name <required> < domain name to create >
engine_name: <required> <engine name to map the domain>

Get Domain information 
===============================

request:

engine_name: <optional> <engine name>

response:
{result:<success> or <failed>,data:[
DomainName
EngineName
type
user_id
CreatedAt
CreatedBy
CurrentStatus
creater_ip
last_updater_ip
UpdatedAt]

response.name: GET ENGINES INFORMATION
response.body:
{
    "data": [

response:
{result:<success> or <failed>

request.description:
Get Domain information 
===============================

request:

domain_name: <optional> <domain name>

engine_name: <optional> <engine name>

response:

Engines.Domains.Pages
Engines.Domains.DomainName
Engines.Domains.LastCrawl
Engines.Domains.CurrentStatus
Engines.Domains.CreatedAt
Engines.Domains.CreatedBy
Engines.Domains.CrawlSchedule

Update Domain settings
=============================

request:

domain_name: <required>
engine_name: <required>

action:<delete,add,set>
element:<below elements>
value:<value to the element>

elements:

AdvancedSettings : <optional> <dict>
BlackListApp : <optional>  <list>
BlackListUrls : <optional>  <list>
CrawlSchedule : <optional>  <list>
CustomResults : <optional> <list>
HtmlTags : <optional>  <list>
ManualUrls : <optional> <list>
Synonums : <optional>  <list>
Weight : <optional> <list>
WhiteListApp : <optional> <list>
WhiteListUrls : <optional> <list>

response:

"result":"success" or "result":"failed"

Delete existing engine and all domains belongs to that engine
===========================================================

request:

engine_name <required> < engine name to delete>

response:

"result":"failed" or "result":"success"

Delete existing domain
=============================

request:

domain_name: <required>
engine_name: <required>

response:

"result":"failed" or "result":"success"

Create user API key (read key and write key for domain or engine)
=====================================================

request:

engine_name: <engine name>

domain_name: <optional and only required to create domain key>

refresh: <required> < create any one of the following key types: 'domain_read_key','domain_write_key','engine_read_key','engine_write_key'>

response:

"result":"failed"
"result":"success"

Get all API keys
======================

request: none

response:

"result":"success" "data": <keys>

(or)

"result":"failed"

Start the web page crawl for given engine and domain name
=====================================================

request:

domain_name: <required> <domain name to crawl>
engine_name: <required> <engine name domain belons to>
custom_settings: <required> < "no" key word for no additional settings >

response:

"results":"failed"

 or
 
"result":"success"

Start the web page crawl for given engine and domain name
=====================================================

request:

domain_name: <required> <domain name to crawl>
engine_name: <required> <engine name domain belons to>

response:

"results":"failed"

 or
 
"result":"success"

Start the web page crawl for given engine and domain name
=====================================================

request:

domain_name: <required> <domain name to crawl>
engine_name: <required> <engine name domain belons to>
rank_id: <required> < array of search result id >
query: < required> <query keyword >
exclude_rank_id:<required> < array of search result id > <used to exclude the results>

response:

"results":"failed"

 or
 
"result":"success"

Start the web page crawl for given engine and domain name
=====================================================

request:

domain_name: <required> <domain name to crawl>
engine_name: <required> <engine name domain belons to>
cursor: <required> < integer number >
count : <required> < integer number >

response:

"results":"failed"

 or
 
"result":"success"

This delete methode will reset the provided qury ranking
=====================================================

request:

domain_name: <required> <domain name to crawl>
engine_name: <required> <engine name domain belons to>
query: <required> < query to reset the elevation >

response:

"results":"failed"

 or
 
"result":"success"

Get end user Search history
====================================
request:

from_time: <optional>
to_time: <optional>
qtype: <required>  <"top_searches">
limit: <required> <limit number of results>
key: <required> < specify the key "domain" key or "engine" key

response:

"result":"success"

or

"result":"error"
Logout the user based on cookie session

Get crawl infrom based on engine name
request:
engine_name : <engine name> <required>
domain_name : <domain name> < optional >
skip : <skip the first n number of results ><optional>
current_status : <filter based on current crawl status > <options: running / completed / pending /failed > <optional>

response.name: GET CRAWL INFO
